channel.title: New sprites for bank tab or whatever might make bank tabs?
channel.description: im using pi and exion client and im pretty sure this is client sided but people on my forum have beed suggesting that i make bank tabs so they could orginize ther items like in rs. so how might i do this? or can somebody point me to a tut?
